product_name: MYFOREST 700ml/24oz Tritan™ Water Bottle, Large Spout for Gulp/Removable Straw for Sip, Anti-Scratch Time Marker for Motivational Hydration, Drop-Resistant/BPA-Free
description:
😎2-in-1 Cap>> Two modes of drinking: You can simply pull out the straw for a large swig drink (either permanently or temporarily), or keep it so you can still sip.   
🌞Premium Quality>> Made of 1.5mm thick 𝑻𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒂𝒏, which can tolerate -20℃ to 110℃. The time-marking prints are enhanced to resist most everyday scratches.   
🌞Healthy for All Ages>> This 𝑻𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒂𝒏 material has been widely proven BPA-free by American and European authorities, 100% non-toxic, and zero harmful chemicals even under extreme conditions. No odor at all. Carbonated beverages, alcohol, fruit juice and acid energy drinks are safe to fill. No coating, no yellowing, sturdy to resist 0.7-meter accidental fall and scratch.   
🌞Functional Design>> The straw and hand loop are detachable for cleaning. The lid is easily single-hand lockable and 100% leak-proof and spill-proof. The 6cm wide-open mouth helps to clean the limescale.

latest_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
latest_reviews.text: Love this water bottle! The colors are so cute and the writing on the side help me track my water intake thru the day! I like that it's 1L cos it's light and easier to pack when full, compared to a 2L jug. Makes it so easy to get 2L in, just refill at 2pm each day (morning times on left label afternoon times on the right label).One key to prevent leaks tho, is to be sure the clear seal inside lid is tucked into lid well. If this seal gets off its track, it will leak.Also, there's a plastic tab on the lid you can flip up to prevent the lid from opening during travel.

latest_reviews.title: EXCELLENT bottle
latest_reviews.text: No need to stop. Really well built bottle.

latest_reviews.title: Love it
latest_reviews.text: Durable, easy to use. Would 100% buy again

latest_reviews.title: Make sure sealed to prevent leaks
latest_reviews.text: Love this water bottle! The colors are so cute and the writing on the side help me track my water intake thru the day! I like that it's 1L cos it's light and easier to pack when full, compared to a 2L jug. Makes it so easy to get 2L in, just refill at 2pm each day (morning times on left label afternoon times on the right label).One key to prevent leaks tho, is to be sure the clear seal inside lid is tucked into lid well. If this seal gets off its track, it will leak.Also, there's a plastic tab on the lid you can flip up to prevent the lid from opening during travel.

latest_reviews.title: Take note of the size in the description
latest_reviews.text: The bottles are well made, though it did take a beat to understand how the straws are assembled as they were put together differently on the 2 sets. When the second set arrived we realized that they come in different sizes. This was exactly as advertised and the perfect size to take anywhere. Came with a straw and bottle cleaner to make the choice even easier.

latest_reviews.title: Solid
latest_reviews.text: Great bottle, easy to clean and use. I use it everyday and it's perfect for my needs.

latest_reviews.title: Dripping, such a waste of money.
latest_reviews.text: Update.. Not impressed with this bottle not spill proof as advertised. No warranty. I will stick with contigo as they have life time warranty. I'm very disappointed with this purchase. I bought two bottles and both of them are dripping. Such a waste of money.
